name: Bit BattleZ
description:
Welcome to Bit BattleZ! Gameplay

Each turn you gain mana, to spend on abilities. Use your normal attack to save up mana for an expensive game-changing ability!

The shop

Collect loot from the shop (no lootboxes, only direct purchase!) Each weapon has it's own playstyle and own abilities. But thats not the only type of thing you can buy! You can also purchase costumes, pets*, accessories* and more!

Enemies

Now there are 3 enemies, and 4 event enemies. Each major update will have a new event with new event enemies. All old  event enemies become normal ones.

*in a future update
